abstract: Paris Journal; Frenchman Andre Bamberski was so desperate to have German doctor Dieter Krombach stand trial for alleged rape and murder of Bamberski's daughter decades earlier, that he had Krombach kidnapped in Germany and smuggled to France
snippet: A Frenchman was so desperate to have the German man he accused of killing his daughter stand trial that he had him kidnapped in Germany and smuggled to France.
lead_paragraph: A Frenchman was so desperate to have the German man he accused of killing his daughter stand trial that he had him kidnapped in Germany and smuggled to France.

headline.main: Long Pursuit of Justice Takes a Father Beyond the Law
headline.print_headline: Long Pursuit of Justice Takes a Father Beyond the Law
headline.seo: For 3 Decades, French Father Pursued Justice for His Daughter
